name: Leighvi Moment.
description:
Controls:

Left Click - Shoot

WASD - Move

Shift - Sneak

Q, Space, Right Click - Abilities

How to play:

Survive the wave of oncoming enemies by shooting and using your abilities (killing enemies awards cash)

Pick up runes for a power boost, they disappear at the end of the wave (it is highly recommended to pick up the cash bonus rune every round).

Once the wave is over, buy upgrades in the shop (watch out for enemy speed).

Survive for as long as you can! (or until the game breaks).

Runes:

All rune effects last 20 seconds.

Yellow - Cash Bonus (3X cash from kills)

White - Speed Boost (1.5X speed)

Red - Insta-kill (1 bullet to kill enemies)

Green - Invincibility (can't die while active)

Abilities:

Q - Incendiary Grenade (20s cool down, stays lit for 10s, throws incendiary grenade towards your cursor)

Space - Dash (5s cool down, dash in movement direction)

Right Click - Outwards Blast (20s cool down, does damage and blasts enemies away from you)

Upgrades:

Health Buff: increases health by 75HP and fills your health bar.

Damage Buff: increases bullet damage by 5HP.

Sprint Buff: increases speed by 4m/s (keep track of enemy speed to make sure you can outrun them).

Story:

(just imagine)

This, is Leighvi.

He took too much, and now he's goners.

He has lost himself in the middle of a shopping mall and must now fight for his life.

All because he always wants more...

Extra information:

This game is a prototype. It only has 3 months of work put into it and probably won't be worked on much (probably). I wanna work on some other prototypes and then choose what to focus on for the long term. This is my first project in a really long time and I'm proud even though it's terrible. Hope you enjoy!

PS: Please let me know if something is broken and I'll try to patch it.
